name: Baby Puzzle: Match the shape
description:
Baby Puzzle Match The Shape is an educational game for kids.
You have to drag the shape on a shadow of that shape like jigsaw.
Kids will learn pre school activities by playing this game.
Features
1)Free Game
2)All the shape are HD.
3)4 different categories.
1.Letters
2.Numbers
3.Geometric Shape
4.Vehicle
